share on x mothe funeral home. jun 10 at 5:00 pm 48 files added to the album life. tributes comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x jeanne bourgeois. jun 10 at 4:33 pm the mother of one of my daughters and grandchildren in my heart and the times we shared at their birthday parties were so special! loved talking to her and i know she touched quite a few people in her life. she did me, love you and know that god loves you more! comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x susan buetow. jun 10 at 2:57 pm emily buetow had mrs schexnayder as he k teacher at salem. we loved hearing her try and say her name! best memory ever.... i worked at the school so i was always around. i walked through the cafeteria one day and made eye contact with emily. i stuck my tongue out at her and she returned the gesture, gladly! well bonnie only saw emily stick her tongue out at me. as i was going out of the cafeteria i heard her tell emily how disrespectful that was to her mother or to any adult. she then called out for me so emily could apologize. i had to confess that it was my fault and i started it. bonnie didn't know whether to cry or laugh! i had to apologize to emily and to her for disturbing lunch hour. loved her and she was well respected at salem by family, staff, and the kids. rest in peace sister in christ. christ has risen. comment share comment share facebook twitter share on x more memories... visitation. jun 11. 6:00 pm - 10:00 pm mothe funeral home harvey2100 westbank expressway. harvey, la, us, 70058. get order flowers now for bonnie's visitation visitation. jun 12. 8:00 am - 11:00 am mothe funeral home harvey2100 westbank expressway. harvey, la, us, 70058. get order flowers now for bonnie's visitation service. jun 12. 11:00 am - 12:00 pm mothe funeral home harvey2100 westbank expressway. harvey, la, us, 70058. get order flowers now for bonnie's service life. tributes wall 365 days of grief support. subscribe mothe funeral home website designed by funeralone contact obituaries about store 
get order flowers now for bonnie's visitation visitation. jun 12. 8:00 am - 11:00 am mothe funeral home harvey2100 westbank expressway. harvey, la, us, 70058. get order flowers now for bonnie's visitation service. jun 12. 11:00 am - 12:00 pm mothe funeral home harvey2100 westbank expressway. harvey, la, us, 70058. get order flowers now for bonnie's service cemetery details. mcdonoghville cemetery520 hancock st. gretna, la, us, 70053. get show less view & service share facebook twitter google+ post now light a candle virtual gifts yellow rose periwinkle blue green red dove angel heart hug butterfly roses hands in prayer bible sunshine teddy american flag veteran rosary gardener interlocked rings catholic cross football baseball golf sailboat firefighter non catholic cross basketball police buddha hockey coach soccer star of david canadian flag menorah memories events media share a memory of bonnie van hees schexnayder send comfort to the schexnayder family when it's needed most. to show you care same-day hand delivery by a local florist! amanda fayard. jun 10 at 8:00 pm i'm very sorry for your loss. my thought are with your family. ms. bonnie was a great teacher and a wonderfully caring person. one memory that stands out is when i lost my lost tooth. it was in a little dixie cup that got knocked over and the tooth was seemingly lost forever. after hrlping me look all over for it, mrs. schexnayder brought me to the door that went to the playground and helped me find a little pebble that looked like a little tooth. i remember her consoling me, and assuring me that the tooth fairy wouldn't be able to tell. that meant the world to little 5/6 year old me, and her kindness always stuck with me. comment share comment share facebook twitter
